## types.boolean variable

A boolean prop type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
boolean: (defaultValue: boolean, opts?: {
    label?: string | undefined;
    sanitize?: Sanitizer<boolean> | undefined;
    interpolate?: Interpolator<boolean> | undefined;
} | undefined) => PropTypeConfig_Boolean
```

## Example

Usage:

```ts
// shorthand:
const obj = sheet.object('key', {isOn: true})

// with a label:
const obj = sheet.object('key', {
  isOn: t.boolean(true, {
    label: 'Enabled'
  })
})
```
